title: Messaging Systems
alt: SMS is just the worst, but I'm having trouble convincing people to adopt my preferred system, TLS IRC with a local server and a patched DOSBox gateway running in my mobile browser.
transcript: Facebook Messenger, Hangouts, Discord, Various DMsSignal, iMessage, WhatsappPGP Email, Various Obscure Projects, Skype I think, XMPP and XMPP + XEP-0384: OMEMOSMS
